data.description: Convert AcrossLite files to other formats
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I needed a way to easily convert binary AcrossLite data files to
    plain text and xml. Not finding an existing module on the CPAN to do
    this, I wrote one and would like to share through CPAN.

    I wasn't sure whether to register this module under
    Convert::AcrossLite or Games::AcrossLite. This module is only used
    to convert AcrossLite files to other formats (text for now, xml and
    others to follow), so it didn't seem to be a candidate for the Games
    namespace.
